SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, HEART, USERROLE FROM ( SELECT FYP_BOARD.*, FYP_MEMBER.USERROLE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FYP_BOARD.BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM FYP_BOARD RIGHT JOIN FYP_MEMBER ON FYP_BOARD.WRITER = FYP_MEMBER.USERID WHERE 1=1 AND FYP_BOARD.BNO > 0
) FYP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FYP_FILE( FILE_NO, BNO, ORG_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE )VALUES( HAEUN.SEQ_FYP_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{BNO}, #{ORG_FILE_NAME}, #{STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE} )
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO,ORG_FILE_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE, DEL_GB FROM FYP_FILE WHERE BNO = #{BNO} AND DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY FILE_NO ASC
